title: Cross-Section: a Collection of Short Stories
description: A selection of short stories exploring a variety of genres, from science-fiction to fantasy to horror. Some of the stories found within: In "Four Hours", a terrorist strike leaves the vast Lunar Colony without oxygen...and only four hours to repair the damage. "Maurice" tells the tale of a young boy driven from his home village by a possessed mob and the journey he undertakes with the only sane villager left. An escaped convict from the Overworld, a vast space station, goes on the run on the ruined surface of Earth in "A Prelude". "Compacted" explores the explosive potential for destruction within a young girl's mind.
author: Conor Engelbrecht
